EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.11-03-2016
EmailTemplate.subject: Monetizing Your Data, Driving Adoption and Digital Disruption at VW
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NOVEMBER 3, 2016 <[[https://medium.com/built-to-adapt/stop-trying-to-monetize-your-data-a61791fa5d98#.kfq8mmnea]]> Stop Trying to Monetize Your Data Dormain Drewitz explains how data can help your customers take action based on insights. Read More <[[https://medium.com/built-to-adapt/stop-trying-to-monetize-your-data-a61791fa5d98#.kfq8mmnea]]> <[[https://youtu.be/koo4pt_T-FU]]> From 0 to 1000 Apps: The First Year of Cloud Foundry at The Home Depot Anthony McCulley shares valuable lessons he learned about organizational change and driving adoption at The Home Depot. Watch Now <[[https://youtu.be/koo4pt_T-FU]]> <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-conversations/features/inter-service-communication-contract-testing-service-versioning]]> Consumer-driven Contract Testing & Service Versioning Distributed systems are hard. Building a microservices architecture that supports evolutionary changes without causing massive problems? Especially hard. In this podcast, Coté and Richard Seroter grabbed Pivotal employees Oliver Gierke, Kenny Bastani, and Andrew Clay Shafer to discuss microservices design and evolution. Listen To The Episode <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-conversations/features/inter-service-communication-contract-testing-service-versioning]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jST_WykaIEk]]> Digital Disruption at Volkswagen Group: Is It All About Cars? Herr Bornemann joins us to discuss the threats and opportunities of digital disruption to Volkswagen Group, as well as their strategy to minimize the threats and maximize the opportunities. Watch Now <[[https://youtu.be/jST_WykaIEk]]> <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/p-o-v/to-avoid-getting-caught-in-the-developer-skills-gap-do-this]]> To Avoid Getting Caught in the Developer Skills Gap, Do This. Some practical tactics that we know to solve for a growing challenge in the industry. Learn More <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/p-o-v/to-avoid-getting-caught-in-the-developer-skills-gap-do-this]]> <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/troubleshooting-microservices-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry-metrics-1-2]]> Troubleshooting Microservices With Pivotal Cloud Foundry Metrics 1.2 The new PCF Metrics 1.2 release makes troubleshooting less murder mystery and more drop-dead simple. Check it Out <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/troubleshooting-microservices-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry-metrics-1-2"]]> Upcoming Events 11/4 Pivotal Cloud Native Road Show, Dallas <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/dallas]]>
